definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly

sentences.english: A CD-ROM can only read information from the disk.
sentences.chinese: 光驅只能從磁盤裏面讀取信息。

sentences.english: You have to burn this release, since virtual drives are blacklisted.
sentences.chinese: 此版必須刻盤，虛擬光驅軟件已被列入黑名單。

sentences.english: Then you can install CATIA using the CDs.
sentences.chinese: 如果刻錄安裝嫌麻煩，也可以用虛擬光驅來安裝。

sentences.english: The authors believe it was probably caused by heat emanating from the optical drive.
sentences.chinese: 編者相信這應該是由於光驅散發的熱量。

sentences.english: Regulation when different drives are not the same as the direction of rotation.
sentences.chinese: 不同的光驅調節時旋轉的方向也不一樣。

sentences.english: Certain CD and DVD drives can be very loud.
sentences.chinese: 某些CD和DVD光驅能搞出很大聲音。

definition: to record on a CD or DVD/to burn a disc
(of a mobile app) to crash on startup/to crash
falling intonation (linguistics)/to lower the key of a tune/to demote
hardware-only device/computer without operating system or other software installed/mobile phone or pager without network subscription
lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
